      • getBuild

        IBuild getBuild()
        Returns associated build.

        Valid after successful activation.

        Different calls will produce different instances.

        Returns:
        IBuild instance (not null)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if build is not yet available (or there was serious error during activation)

      • registerOutputFile

        void registerOutputFile(IBuildArtifact artifact,
                        java.io.File file)
        Register output file whose contents should be logged during build.

        It is OK if given file does not (or will not) exist.

        Parameters:
        artifact - artifact the file belongs to
        file - file
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if file is null
